content: Hello, are there guidelines for asking for reviewer feedback? For example, when to request a re-review, what to tag them in, etc? Or is it down to personal preference?
I'm not aware of any guidelines - do whatever seems reasonable and sensible, or ask them what they prefer.
I expect that reviewers won't mind requests for re-review or being pinged (some folks get a lot of pings and so might not see it, but I don't think anyone actively doesn't want pinged).
FWIW I'd personally find a zulip PM much more useful because github pings are indeed likely to get lost
